jobs.title: Technology Risk Intern
description: Conducted research and prepared reports on bank technology, digital payments, and cybersecurity emerging risks
Assisted in conducting IT, payments, and cybersecurity examinations of banks and/or service providers
Reviewed bank or service provider examination reports
Participated in supervisory and risk meetings and related organizational functions
Supported department management on special projects and other time-sensitive assignments

jobs.title: Quality Assurance Inspector
description: Worked in a manufacturing facility that produces world class precision injection molding and assembly
Documented quality control for products that serve the medical, pharmaceutical, packaging, and industrial markets
Assured products met business fulfillment requirements for customers
Applied consistent & robust processes that improve quality of products and speed to market
